biscuit_food.name: Fish Biscuits
biscuit_food.desc:
Restores all HP when consumed. Fish Biscuits are small, compact wafers made of delicious wild berries, soy protein, bacon fat, and high fructose corn syrup. "Fish Biscuits: They're what fish crave!"
Cook thoroughly before eating. Do not consume while pregnant. Consult your doctor before use. Fish Biscuits cannot be used as a tourniquet.

reset_stone.name: Level Reset Stone
reset_stone.desc: A stone imbued with magical energies. It has the power to re-randomize the current dungeon level, letting you experience a brand new set of events, search for new treasures, and fight new monsters.

gold.name: Gold Pieces (GP)
gold.desc: Shiny gold pieces, worth a pretty penny. Actually, worth several thousand pretty pennies. Don't spend it all in one place.

weapon_scraps.name: Weapon Scraps
weapon_scraps.desc: Scraps of leather, iron, steel. Formerly part of someone's weapon. Maybe you could use it to make your own weapons better...

armor_scraps.name: Armor Scraps
armor_scraps.desc: Scraps of leather, iron, scales, or cloth. Formerly part of someone's adventuring gear. Maybe you could use it to reinforce your own armor somehow...

melee_weapon_01.name: Razor Sharp Dagger
melee_weapon_01.desc: A shiny dagger. You could fillet someone with this. Careful not to cut yourself on the blade. +3 DMG when equipped.

melee_weapon_02.name: Short Sword
melee_weapon_02.desc: It's like a dagger, but longer. +4-6 DMG when equipped. STAB ALL THE THINGS.

melee_weapon_03.name: Greatsword
melee_weapon_03.desc: A very large sword. Requires both fins to wield. Good news, though: it does +7-12 DMG when equipped. Enjoy your murder spree!

body_armor_01.name: Leather Armor
body_armor_01.desc: A set of leather armor. Gives +3 Armor when worn. Gives 0 Armor when it's just sitting in your bag.

head_armor_01.name: Leather Helm
head_armor_01.desc: A round helm made out of leather. With some difficulty, you can adapt it to the shape of your head. +3 Armor when worn.

shield_01.name: Hide Shield
shield_01.desc: A deer hide wrapped around a frame of fish bones. You're not really sure how a deer got underwater, but you're grateful for the +5 Armor it provides when equipped.
